title: Arunodaya jewellery landing page positioning refresh

requirements.summary: Rewrite landing page copy/CTAs/section content to position Arunodaya for a jewellery use case (English only) while keeping existing theme styling and working anchors.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero headline/subheadline mention jewellery (e.g., fine jewellery, handcrafted jewellery, designs, craftsmanship) instead of generic tech/sunrise messaging.

The “Something Amazing is Coming” section is rewritten to describe upcoming jewellery-related features/services (e.g., new collections, custom orders, certifications/craftsmanship, appointments), without adding real e-commerce functionality.
Navigation and CTA button labels are updated to match a jewellery context (e.g., “Browse Collection”, “Book Appointment”, “Get Updates”), and their anchor targets still work on the page.
No blue/purple primary palette is introduced; styling remains consistent with the existing theme system.

file_operations.description: Add the jewellery-themed logo asset (edited from generated/arunodaya-logo.dim_512x512.png per imageRequirements.edits) at this exact path for the header brand mark.
Add the jewellery-themed hero background asset (edited from generated/arunodaya-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png per imageRequirements.edits) at this exact path for the hero background image.

Update header/hero/coming-soon copy to jewellery positioning (English only) while keeping the app name “Arunodaya”; update navigation link labels and primary/secondary CTA button labels to jewellery-context and ensure href anchors still target existing sections (e.g., #home, #about). Update header logo src to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/arunodaya-logo-jewellery.dim_512x512.png and hero background to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/arunodaya-hero-bg-jewellery.dim_1920x1080.png. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/Card components to preserve current theme consistency; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update HTML metadata description to reflect jewellery positioning while keeping the document title as “Arunodaya” (English only).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` meta description no longer describes a generic “new dawn” message and instead describes Arunodaya as a jewellery-focused brand/app.

file_operations.description: Add the jewellery-themed app icon asset (edited from generated/arunodaya-icon.dim_256x256.png per imageRequirements.edits) at this exact path so the site can reference it as favicon/apple-touch-icon.

Replace the meta description with jewellery-focused English copy while keeping the <title> as “Arunodaya”. Update favicon and apple-touch-icon references to frontend/public/assets/generated/arunodaya-icon-jewellery.dim_256x256.png.

requirements.summary: Replace landing-page icons with jewellery-appropriate symbols while keeping layout coherent and avoiding broken imports.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero badge/feature-card icons are updated to jewellery-relevant symbols (e.g., gem/diamond/ring) and still render correctly.
No broken imports or missing icon renderings occur in the landing page.

file_operations.description: Swap lucide-react icon imports/usages for jewellery-relevant icons (e.g., gem/diamond/ring) in the hero badge and feature cards, ensuring all icon components render without missing imports and the layout remains unchanged.
